name: Solitaire TriPeaks Journey
description:
Adventure through mysterious underwater environments, secretive forests, and much more; while training your brain with Solitaire TriPeaks Journey--the classic, loved solitaire card game with exciting new twists. While roaming in a secluded desert use volcanoes to change your gaming experience, or pull a wild card at the critical moment while exploring in future releases.
Do you play Classic Solitaire, Pyramid, Freecell, logic puzzle or Spider Solitaire? Try Solitaire TriPeaks! Solitaire fans and card games fans will love the free games of TriPeaks Solitaire(also known as Tri Towers, Triple Peaks or Three Peaks)!
HIGHLIGHTS:
- Great graphics and amazing, beautiful themes.
- Wield game-changing cards, with magical effects!
- Hundreds of different levels, with more in later releases!
- Land on the Leaderboard to compete with friends.
- Uncover hidden Golden Treasures on your journey.
FEATURES:
- 10,000 Welcome bonus and Massive Daily coins each day!
- Fill up your Streak Meter to win free BONUSES and WILD cards!
- Compete with your friends, and play Solitaire Tripeaks together!
- Tri-peaks Solitaire in your hands, anytime, anywhere.
Never played Solitaire or any card games before? No worries. TriPeaks Solitaire is Easy to play! Simply complete a quick tutorial and you'll be a pro in no time! It's a casual, entertaining free card game for everyone to enjoy! What are you waiting for?
Begin your adventure now! Download and Enjoy, exciting new Solitaire gameplay for FREE!
